title: Portfolio

content:
SEPHORA is a French cosmetics brand founded in 1969. During the past half year at Sephora, I worked as a UED intern in Digital Vnture Department.In there,our team feels like a warm family, creating beauty power and helping customers explore their different facets of beauty.
在丝芙兰的近半年的日子里，我在DV部门里担任一名UED实习生。在这里，我们的队伍像是一个温暖的大家庭，一起在创造美力和帮助顾客发现自己多面的美的路上砥砺前行。
Our work is divided into two parts: APP/MNP design and Future Store digital media design, and I have been involved in both，Including user research, UX and UI design.
我们的工作分为APP和MNP的设计以及未来店的数字媒体设计，而这两者我也均有参与。包括用户研究、交互设计和界面设计。
Intro # Some photos come from internet in this two pages
Prepare # APP & MNP Design # Booking Service - Q2 design # Smart Beauty Adviser - design # MNP&Tiktok - KV design # Weekly Deals - user research # In this section, due to my role as an assistant and the fact that this content section has not yet been launched, the research results and brainstorming section will not be temporarily published on the website.
在这一部分中，由于我担任辅助角色，同时该内容板块还未上线，调研结果及头脑风暴部分暂时不发布在网站上。
Future Store # Photo Stickers - design # Care Analysis - design # Look Analysis - design #
summary: SEPHORA is a French cosmetics brand founded in 1969. During the past half year at Sephora, I worked as a UED intern in Digital Vnture Department.In there,our team feels like a warm family, creating beauty power and helping customers explore their different facets of beauty.
title: SEPHORA

content: Blowfish has full support for Hugo taxonomies and will adapt to any taxonomy set up. Taxonomy listings like this one also support custom content to be displayed above the list of terms.
summary: Blowfish has full support for Hugo taxonomies and will adapt to any taxonomy set up. Taxonomy listings like this one also support custom content to be displayed above the list of terms.
title: Tags

content:
Partners：Lufei Ding , Zhilei Li
We focus on data analysis for a specific APP, starting from product positioning, competitive analysis, and user perspective. We analyze the product information architecture,use the HEART model and GSM model to analysis core business paths and speculate on event tracking design. This helps us learn data-driven design, improving empathise,define,ideate,prototype and test through data using.
我们聚焦于某个APP的数据分析，从产品定位、竞品和用户出发，分析其产品信息架构，借助HEART模型&GSM模型分析其核心业务路径和推测埋点设计。以此学习数据驱动设计，帮助我们在设计中更好的理解用户、发现问题、决策、评估与日常监测。
Content # Intro # Data Analysis # Study & Review Words # Purchase VIP Service # Summary & Promotion #
summary:
Partners：Lufei Ding , Zhilei Li
We focus on data analysis for a specific APP, starting from product positioning, competitive analysis, and user perspective. We analyze the product information architecture,use the HEART model and GSM model to analysis core business paths and speculate on event tracking design.
title: 不背单词APP-设计数据分析

content:
Background: User research and product/service platform design focused on addressing the issue of zero waste in dormitories, with user research being a central component.
背景：针对宿舍零浪费问题的用户研究与产品和服务平台设计，其中用户研究为核心部分.
With the goal of promoting low-carbon dormitories, we aim to address issues such as students finding it difficult to adopt low-carbon lifestyles, complex procedures, and weak motivation. We will reconstruct the campus second-hand trading facilities and service platform, optimize the second-hand trading and idle leasing procedures, and solve problems such as dormitory management issues caused by private transactions, poor timeliness, mixed transactions, and difficulties in obtaining information.
以促进宿舍低碳为目标，挖掘学生低碳难、流程复杂、意愿弱等问题，重构校园二手交易设施与服务平台，优化二手交易及闲置租赁程序，解决私下交易带来的宿舍管理问题与现有交易方式时效性差、混杂、获取困难等问题。
Successfully completed user research, online service platform demo design, and offline cabinet design, and received excellent evaluations from teachers.
完成用户研究、线上服务平台demo设计及线下柜体设计，获得教师优秀评价.
User Research part was finished with my partner Kechun Li.
Intro # User Research # Analysis # Design #
summary:
Background: User research and product/service platform design focused on addressing the issue of zero waste in dormitories, with user research being a central component.
背景：针对宿舍零浪费问题的用户研究与产品和服务平台设计，其中用户研究为核心部分.
With the goal of promoting low-carbon dormitories, we aim to address issues such as students finding it difficult to adopt low-carbon lifestyles, complex procedures, and weak motivation.
title: Infinite Carbinet

content:
This is the advanced tag. Just like other listing pages in Blowfish, you can add custom content to individual taxonomy terms and it will be displayed at the top of the term listing. 🚀
You can also use these content pages to define Hugo metadata like titles and descriptions that will be used for SEO and other purposes.
